text: @maddow Is this why after several tries, Hawaii is looking to get Coronavirus test kits from Japan, instead of the CDC? First kit was sent to the wrong State, then eventually arrived broken. The next kit sent was a dud. New kits have to be manufactured but that won't start till mid-March

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
